channel.title: If you could go back in time and say one sentence to Hitler
channel.description: If you could go back in time and say one sentence to Hitler before being sucked back into the time vortex, what would it be? Telling him not to attack a place or that hes going to lose WWII won't work because of course hes just going to think its a load of bull shit.

item.title: If you could go back in time and say one sentence to Hitler
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

[quote=“oliver1205, post:70, topic:28123”][quote author=Bebemycat2 link=topic=41620.msg535182#msg535182 date=1164618939]

Q. Whats the difference between a Jew and a Pizza?

A. A pizza doesn’t scream when you put it in the oven.

i hope your not serious or you or one messed up person…

Oh she’s serious.

if she reall is ( witch i hope she isnt ) then shes a rasict asshole. and i wont say more because i dont want to start a falme war…

Thank you. Your comment has inspired me to post even more pictures…

You have a nice day now.
[/quote]

racist hoe. i have alot of good friends who are jewish. go to hell bitch.raist bitch. i just lost all my respect i MIGHTVE had for you. just looking at those pictures makes me sick, and you think its a effing joke?[/quote]
Go chase a nickel you big nose Jew sympathizer.

<3 Aryan race!
<3 Gas chambers
<3 Hitler
<3 Social Darwinism!!!

Read full topic

item.source: If you could go back in time and say one sentence to Hitler

item.title: If you could go back in time and say one sentence to Hitler
item.dc:creator: @googlethis googlethis
item.description:
@googlethis wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:67, topic:28123”][quote author=Smegman link=topic=41620.msg539740#msg539740 date=1164708754]

I’d go back in time bitch slap that bitch, pull out a Glock 45 and cap his ass before I get sucked back to the present… and shoot one last shot which will get him between the eyes! Mwahahaha

Would you now?

What if, since you killed hitler in the past, your great grandmother fell in love with one of the people that hitler killed in the timeline that was supposed to be before you interfered, instead of with your great grandfather, which caused you to never come into existance, which didn’t allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist…

Stack Overflow error, universe explodes.

[me=Smegman]claps[/me]
the universe isnt like a program… you dont have stack overflows >_>
[/quote]

You do if you mess with the timeline :)[/quote]I wonder if there’s array index out of bounds errors in the universe?

Read full topic

[quote=“Smegman, post:65, topic:28123”][quote author=moparisthebest link=topic=41620.msg539690#msg539690 date=1164707354]

I’d go back in time bitch slap that bitch, pull out a Glock 45 and cap his ass before I get sucked back to the present… and shoot one last shot which will get him between the eyes! Mwahahaha

Would you now?

What if, since you killed hitler in the past, your great grandmother fell in love with one of the people that hitler killed in the timeline that was supposed to be before you interfered, instead of with your great grandfather, which caused you to never come into existance, which didn’t allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist, which would cause you to kill hitler, which would cause you to not exist, which would not allow you to kill hitler, which would cause you to exist…

Stack Overflow error, universe explodes.
[/quote]
[me=Smegman]claps[/me]
the universe isnt like a program… you dont have stack overflows >_>[/quote]

You do if you mess with the timeline
